name: Cherry Moreno
review: This is a very friendly church in a lovely district of town. We live in the neighborhood and stopped in for a visit and were so welcomed. They keep the grounds beautiful and have a very active youth for families with children. The pastor gave a very intelligent and passionate sermon that really resonated. I am not a big fan of some of the "rituals" and repetitive but the whole of the experience was delightful.

name: David Grove IV
review: A great, friendly place that has been a wonderful alternative to Halloween. It was quite a safe place during hurricane Ivan. God bless.

name: Mark Roche
